item.description:
Join us for a trip to one of New England?s premier cross-country ski centers (less than two hours from Boston)! Come ski their 25 miles of wooded trails including some of the more difficult trails in southern New England. You can bring your lunch or purchase lunch in the lodge. Rentals are available on site. Check the website for directions, ski conditions and other information, http://www.windblownx...
RSVP: Required by February 28 Carpooling information will be provided when you RSVP
MEET: We will meet for carpooling at a T accessible location at 8:20 and at 10:20 outside of the lodge, where your purchase your trail pass. We?ll hit the trails at 10:30
COST: trail fee $15, rentals $16, $5 for non-members. Cash or check only

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Cross-Country Skiing at Windblown
